Couple

Class Couple

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Couple class consists of couple information

      int breakup(Couple[] couple, Girl[] girl, Boy[] boy, int no_of_couple, int k)

              int atboy,
              int atgirl,
              int intboy,
              int intgirl,
              int budboy,
              int budgirl,
              int hapboy,
              int hapgirl,
              int boy_index,
              int girl_index)
        Constructor of Couple Class
        Parameters:
        Boy_name - name of Boy
        Girl_name - name of Girl
        atboy - attractiveness of Boy
        atgirl - attractiveness of Girl
        intboy - intelligence of Boy
        intgirl - intelligence of Girl
        budboy - budget of Boy
        budgirl - maintainence_budget of Girl
        hapboy - happiness of Boy
        hapgirl - happiness of Girl
        boy_index - index of boy in inputted boys array
        girl_index - index of boy in inputted girls array

      • make_couple

        public int make_couple(Boy[] boy,
                       Girl[] girl,
                       Couple[] couple,
                       int no_of_boy,
                       int no_of_girl,
                       int type)
                throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                       java.io.IOException
        This function is responsible for formation of couple. First a girl is assigned a boy and then boy is assigned a girl alternately. Return the no of couple formed
        Parameters:
        boy - Boys Array
        girl - Girls Array
        couple - Couples Array
        no_of_boy - No of boys
        no_of_girl - No of Girls
        Returns:
        no of couple formed
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException

      • make_couple

        public int make_couple(Boy[] boy,
                       Girl[] girl,
                       Couple[] couple,
                       int no_of_boy,
                       int no_of_girl)
                throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                       java.io.IOException
        This function is responsible for formation of couple. Each girl is assigned a boy based on her requirement
        Parameters:
        boy - Boys Array
        girl - Girls Array
        couple - Couples Array
        no_of_boy - No of boys
        no_of_girl - No of Girls
        Returns:
        no of couples formed
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException
